entry.answer: Indra used the vajra (thunderbolt) to slay the demon Vritra, who had trapped the cosmic waters. This victory restored the flow of rivers and established Indra as the king of the gods. The text emphasizes that this act was part of a cosmic order maintained by divine intervention.
